columns.name: P_NUMBER
columns.meaning: Unique ISWS identifier for the observation well.

columns.name: X_LAMBERT
columns.meaning: X location in Lambert Conformal Conic projection.

columns.name: Y_LAMBERT
columns.meaning: Y location in Lambert Conformal Conic projection.

columns.name: LONG_NAD_83
columns.meaning: X location in GCS NAD 83 (2011).

columns.name: LAT_NAD_83
columns.meaning: Y location in GCS NAD 83 (2011).

columns.name: LONG_WGS_84
columns.meaning: X location in WGS 84.

columns.name: LAT_WGS_84
columns.meaning: Y location in WGS 84.

columns.name: X_WEBMERC
columns.meaning: X location in Web Mercator Auxiliary Sphere projection.

columns.name: Y_WEBMERC
columns.meaning: Y location in Web Mercator Auxiliary Sphere projection.

columns.name: LOC_TYPE
columns.meaning: Whether location was estimated from maps or measured by GPS.

columns.name: LOC_METHOD
columns.meaning: Method of estimation or measurement.

columns.name: LOC_DATUM
columns.meaning: Horizontal datum of XY measurement.

columns.name: LOC_ACCUR_FT
columns.meaning: Estimated or recorded accuracy of XY location in feet.

columns.name: LOC_SOURCE
columns.meaning: Who determined the location information.

columns.name: LS_ELEV_FT
columns.meaning: Elevation of land surface above mean sea level in feet.

columns.name: LS_ELEV_TYPE
columns.meaning: Whether elevation was estimated, measured, or calculated.

columns.name: LS_ELEV_METHOD
columns.meaning: Method used to determine land surface elevation.

columns.name: LS_ELEV_DATUM
columns.meaning: Vertical datum of land surface elevation.

columns.name: LS_ELEV_ACCUR_FT
columns.meaning: Estimated or recorded accuracy of land surface elevation in feet.

columns.name: LS_ELEV_SOURCE
columns.meaning: Who determined the land surface elevation information.

columns.name: STICKUP_FT
columns.meaning: Vertical distance from land surface to the measuring point of the well in feet.

columns.name: STICKUP_TYPE
columns.meaning: Whether stickup was estimated, measured, or calculated.

columns.name: STICKUP_METHOD
columns.meaning: Method used to determine stickup.

columns.name: STICKUP_SOURCE
columns.meaning: Who determined the stickup information.

columns.name: TOC_ELEV_FT
columns.meaning: Elevation of top of casing or measuring point in feet above mean sea level.

columns.name: TOC_ELEV_TYPE
columns.meaning: Whether top of casing elevation was estimated, measured, or calculated.

columns.name: TOC_ELEV_METHOD
columns.meaning: Method used to determine top of casing elevation.

columns.name: TOC_ELEV_DATUM
columns.meaning: Vertical datum of top of casing elevation.

columns.name: TOC_ELEV_ACCUR_FT
columns.meaning: Estimated or recorded accuracy of top of casing elevation in feet.

columns.name: TOC_ELEV_SOURCE
columns.meaning: Who determined the top of casing elevation information.

columns.name: TRANSDUCER_REF
columns.meaning: Depth reference for transducer readings (TOC or LS).
